title: [GAMEPLAY] Miss Fortune Love Tap SFX bug
body: It's not game changing, but I noticed last night, every time I was playing MF and was against a Caitlyn the love tap SFX would be the same SFX for Caitlyn's Q as opposed to the regular love tap SFX. I was playing arcade MF which has a distinct love tap SFX, I do not know if this was happening with her other skins. It did happen every game I faced a Cait, however.

replies.body:
Hey Shaughtgun! 

Thanks for the report! This issue is occurring only with Arcade Miss Fortune and Caitlyn. We're aware of this issue and are working to resolve it! ^-^
